Html:
I am developing Facebook application. When I run application I get bug the very first lines in JavaScript

// Get the initial contents for the RichTextEditor from what is there in the textarea
contents = top.document.getElementById(editorId).value;

Access is denied. I think the problem is in cross-domain frame issue. Because I am hosting my aspx page (with rte) in IFrame of Facebook.com

Look at similar problem with ajax asp.net
